content.description:
A Helmsman Spots Trouble in the Skies

Ipse gubernatorgubernator, -oris, m.: helmsman puppipuppis, -is, f. = navis, -is PalinurusPalinurus, -i, m.: Palinurus (a companion of Aeneas) ab alta: 
“Heuheu, interj.: alas quianamquianam, adv. = cur tanti cinxerunt aethera nimbinimbus, -i, m. = nubes, -is? 
Quidve, pater Neptune, paras?”
content.question: In line 2, quianam tanti cinxerunt aethera nimbi is translated

choices.label: why have so many been surrounded by clouds in the sky
why has the sky been surrounded by such a great cloud
why have the clouds surrounded so much of the sky
why have such great clouds surrounded the sky

content.answer: why have such great clouds surrounded the sky

unit.text: 6: Course Project and Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry
